text: Unfaithfully Yours is a 1984 American romantic comedy movie directed by Howard Zieff and is based on the remake of the 1948 movie of the same name. It stars Dudley Moore, Nastassja Kinski, Albert Brooks, Armand Assante, Cassie Yates, Jan Triska and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Howard Zieff Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about classical music and musicians
title: Unfaithfully Yours (1984 movie)
